RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Center: Judge Ricardo Garcia Regional Detention Center

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: state where the juvenile court is located, involved in a case of alien smuggling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Juvenile Justice Department: department to which J.M.E. was committed for an indeterminate term, providing a structured facility for rehabilitation and confinement
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Judge Ricardo Garcia Regional Detention: detention center where J.M.E. was placed, also referred to as 'the Center', from which J.M.E. was unsuccessfully discharged due to failure to comply with requirements and initiating fights with other juveniles, and where J.M.E. had a history of delinquent conduct and substance abuse
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Webb County Jail: location where J.M.E. attended CAPS counseling and SCAN services, and where J.M.E. was transferred after assaulting another juvenile at TJJD, and where J.M.E. was attending school, receiving good grades, and currently complying with the juvenile court's order by attending CAPS counseling and SCAN services
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Southwest Keys: program for counseling, part of the conditions of probation for J.M.E., related to alien smuggling case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Youth Village: location for Cognitive Life Skills, part of the conditions of probation for J.M.E.
